title: The Itsy Bitsy Spider
short_plot_summary: The itsy bitsy spider climbs up a waterspout, gets washed away by rain, and then tries again when the sun comes out.
explanation: A spider, representing the itsy bitsy spider, the main character of the song
A water droplet, symbolizing the rain that washes the spider away from the waterspout
A partly-cloudy sky, indicating the conditions after the rain stops, allowing the spider to start climbing again
A rainbow, representing the appearance of the sun following the rain, providing a bright and happy setting for the spider's newfound determination
A refresh arrow, signifying the spider's persistence in trying again despite being washed away by the rain
